content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Please note that I will only discuss the rental price. As for the price, I think 1200 Euros per month would be a fair price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but 1200 Euros per month is quite high for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm willing to pay 800 Euros per month, which is a more reasonable price considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low for the apartment's location and condition.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you have set a price. However, I am looking for a more competitive rate. Would you be willing to reconsider your offer?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I have already provided you with a price and I am not willing to negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
